name: Curse
description: You target a creature within a short (10 unit) distance and place a curse on them if they fail a resilience check of 7. While you concentrate on this spell, your target must remake the resilience check again at the start of each turn if they are still within a moderate (20 unit) range, or they take 5 dark damage.
charge: Deal 7 initial dark damage if the spell succeeds.
